short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds GenAI support in list manager product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lyris Listmanager Copilot unlock the power of AI in your email campaigns with the Gen AI Enhancer for List Manager! This powerful plugin seamlessly integrates with List Manager, a robust email campaign manager product, to supercharge your email marketing efforts. With the Gen AI Enhancer, elevate your email campaigns by leveraging AI to automatically generate compelling subject lines, create custom attributes, and autofill HTML templates. Make every email count, enhance engagement, and boost your email marketing ROI with the Gen AI Enhancer for List Manager.
